  G.OPTIONS_EXT_NAME,
  G.OPTIONS_EXT,

  G.OPTIONS_TEXT_NAME,
  G.OPTIONS_TEXT,
  G.OPTION_REF_FL,
  G.OPTIONS_REF_NAME,
  G.OPTIONS_REF,
  G.GOODS_IMAGE_MASTER,
  G.GOODS_IMAGE_ADDED,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

-- 11:53.55
SELECT
  MALL_ID,
  GOODS_CODE,
  LOG_TYPE,
  LOG_DATE,
  LOG_CNT
 FROM kbm_goods_info_log 
     WHERE MALL_ID = 'logomondo' AND
  GOODS_CODE = 'G202010129960574342' AND
  LOG_TYPE = 'V' AND
  LOG_DATE = '20210226' LIMIT 0, 1;

      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (

  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;

      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;

      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.DELIVERY_FL,

  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.OPTION_REF_FL,
  G.OPTIONS_REF_NAME,
  G.OPTIONS_REF,
  G.GOODS_IMAGE_MASTER,
  G.GOODS_IMAGE_ADDED,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.OPTIONS_TEXT,
  G.OPTION_REF_FL,
  G.OPTIONS_REF_NAME,
  G.OPTIONS_REF,
  G.GOODS_IMAGE_MASTER,
  G.GOODS_IMAGE_ADDED,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,

  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,

  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,

  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.OPTIONS_TEXT,

  G.OPTIONS_REF_NAME,
  G.OPTIONS_REF,
  G.GOODS_IMAGE_MASTER,
  G.GOODS_IMAGE_ADDED,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,

  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,

  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.OPTIONS_TEXT,
  G.OPTION_REF_FL,
  G.OPTIONS_REF_NAME,
  G.OPTIONS_REF,
  G.GOODS_IMAGE_MASTER,
  G.GOODS_IMAGE_ADDED,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,

  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,

  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,

  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,

  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,

  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.OPTIONS_TEXT,
  G.OPTION_REF_FL,
  G.OPTIONS_REF_NAME,
  G.OPTIONS_REF,
  G.GOODS_IMAGE_MASTER,
  G.GOODS_IMAGE_ADDED,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;

      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,

  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,

  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.OPTIONS_REF,
  G.GOODS_IMAGE_MASTER,
  G.GOODS_IMAGE_ADDED,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;

      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID

         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )

        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?

        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?

  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.GOODS_IMAGE_MASTER,
  G.GOODS_IMAGE_ADDED,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,

  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.GOODS_IMAGE_ADDED,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.SHORT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;

  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;

      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159

  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION,
  G.EVENT_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_LOCALE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_SAME_FL,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE,
  G.GOODS_DESCRIPTION_MOBILE_LOCALE,
  G.DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DELIVERY_OPTION,
  G.REF_GOODS_FL,
  G.REF_GOODS,
  G.GOODS_MALL_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_SEARCH_OPTION,
  G.GOODS_ATTR,
  G.GOODS_ICON_OPEN_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_CLOSE_DATE,
  G.GOODS_ICON_TIME,
  G.GOODS_ICON_FIX,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_FL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_URL,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_WIDTH,
  G.EXTERNAL_VIDEO_HEIGHT,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_DELIVERY,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_AS,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_REFUND,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE_FL,
  G.DETAIL_INFO_EXCHANGE,
  G.SEO_TAG_FL,
  G.SEO_TAG,
  G.NAVER_FL,
  G.NAVER_OPTIONS,
  G.FACEBOOK_FL,
  G.FACEBOOK_OPTIONS,
  G.MEMO,
  G.REVIEW_CNT,
  G.REVIEW_POINT,
  G.REVIEW_DATE,
  G.QNA_CNT,
  G.QNA_UNANSWERED_CNT,
  G.QNA_DATE,
  G.IS_HIDDEN_FL,
  G.SCM_REG_DATE,
  G.SCM_MOD_DATE,
  G.SCM_UNAPPLY_CNT,
  G.SCM_APPLY_CNT,
  G.DELIVERY_DETAIL,
  G.REG_DATE,
  G.MOD_DATE
      ,
      F.MALL_ID AS F_MALL_ID, 
      F.GOODS_CODE AS F_GOODS_CODE,
      F.TOKEN AS F_TOKEN,
      F.REG_DATE AS F_REG_DATE,
 FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
        G.MALL_ID = F.MALL_ID 
        AND G.GOODS_CODE = F.GOODS_CODE 
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = 'N'
         AND F.TOKEN = ?
       )
     WHERE G.MALL_ID = ?
        AND G.GOODS_CODE NOT LIKE 'TMP%'
        AND G.IS_HIDDEN_FL = ?
        AND (G.MALL_ID, G.GOODS_CODE) IN
        ( SELECT MALL_ID,
        GOODS_CODE FROM kbm_goods_category WHERE MALL_ID = ? AND
        CATE_TYPE = 'C' AND GOODS_CATEGORY = ?
        )
        AND G.SELLER_MEM_NO = ?
  ORDER BY
          G.REG_DATE DESC LIMIT 0, 90;
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MariaDB server version for the right syntax to use near 'FROM kbm_goods_info G 
      LEFT OUTER JOIN kbm_goods_favor F 
      ON (
     ' at line 159
